resources.string: You are playing against the AI
Tic Tac Toe is a 3X3 board game where two players try to place their marks in horizontale, vertical or diagonal rows.
The first game by default is a Human vs Human game.
Press Reset to restart a Tic Tac Toe game session.
Press Zero to reset the Scores.
Press Play to restart the session and switch between Player 1 vs Player 2 and Player 1 vs AI.
Press Score to see the Score board.
App written by Thai-Vu Nguyen and Seaim Khan
